column4: does anyone know how to install an icon theme not packaged as a .tar.gz,; but rather a .zip containing both .png and .ico files?
LosFrijoles: I've had the same issue, when I asked around, I got something akin to "we're working on it"
i was using httrack and left my comp on the couch for about 4 hours, so im going to guess either something overheated or the kernel didn't like my computer for a moment
